body.name: Shemira 17-Inch Vinyl Baby Doll - Lifelike Newborn Dolls for Girls Age 3+, Ideal Gift for Kids, Poseable with Full Body
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 33 mins
features: REBORN-BABY DOLL : Shush,Don't wake her up! The sweet little one is a newborn-baby girl to the world. Her serene expression and delicate cheeks captivating our heart. With her angelic presence, you can't help but long to take her home, be her friend and take care of her! Watching her sleep so peacefully, you will find that you love her so much.

LIFELIKE & REALISTIC BABY BOLL: Her full body is made of vinyl and her skin has wrinkle which makes her skin feels like a real baby's skin. Hand-painted hair and applied eyelashes make her come to life and unique. She is posable, soft, true-to-life details, like a real baby when you held her in arms. You can dress her up with newborn size clothes and diapers.

IDEAL GIFTS - Reborn baby doll is an ideal birthday gift or Christmas gift for kids girls ages 3 4 5 6 7 8 and up. Help your child develop caring and social-cognitive skills. Perfect for grandparents' accompany, reduce loneliness in the elderly. Also great for reborn doll collectors to enrich their collections.
SAFETY MATERIAL - Conforms to the safety requirements of ASTM F963 and EN71 for ages 3+, which is safe for your children.
PACKAGE INCLUDED - Cute reborn baby doll (x1), Clothes set (x1), Feeding bottle (x1), Magnetic pacifier (x1),Diaper (x1), Birth certificate card (x1).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Doll So Real, My Daughter's Delight Knows No Bounds!
reviews.reviewText: but share the joy it has brought into our home. From its lifelike appearance to the endless hours of imaginative play it has inspired, this doll has exceeded all expectations and truly become a cherished member of our family.First and foremost, the realism of the Shemira Girl doll is truly impressive. The attention to detail in the facial features, hair, and clothing is so meticulous that at times, I find myself doing a double-take—it looks that real! The quality craftsmanship is evident, creating a doll that goes beyond a mere toy; it's a lifelike companion that sparks the imagination.My daughter, an avid doll enthusiast, instantly fell in love with Shemira Girl. The doll's size, weight, and texture contribute to an authentic feel that enhances the play experience. The inclusion of lifelike accessories and clothing options adds to the realism, allowing my daughter to engage in imaginative scenarios that bring the doll to life.The durability of Shemira Girl is worth noting. Despite being the center of countless tea parties, fashion shows, and make-believe adventures, the doll has withstood the test of time. The materials used are of high quality, ensuring that this beloved companion remains a steadfast playmate for years to come.One of the standout features is the emotional connection my daughter has developed with Shemira Girl. The doll's relatable appearance and the ability to easily style its hair and change its outfits have sparked endless creative stories and scenarios. It's heartwarming to see the bond formed between my daughter and her doll, turning playtime into a source of joy, comfort, and companionship.In conclusion, the Shemira Girl doll is more than just a toy—it's a treasured companion that has seamlessly woven itself into the fabric of our daily lives. The realism, durability, and the joy it brings to my daughter's world make it a standout choice for parents seeking a doll that transcends expectations. Shemira Girl has truly become a source of endless delight, sparking imaginative play and fostering a connection that goes beyond the surface. A heartfelt recommendation to any parent looking to bring a touch of magic and realism to their child's playtime!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: He’s so amazingly cute! Definitely one of my new favorite dolls!I will admit that based off the pictures, I was worried about what the quality of the doll’s paint. I didn’t need to worry, because the painting is actually very good quality!His eyebrows look a little weird. They look a lot darker than baby eyelashes normally do. The eyebrows make him look a little less realistic than he would otherwise.This is a cute doll, and I would definitely recommend getting one. The vinyl/plastic is a lot softer than expected. I got him on sale.
